item.title: Understand the reasons for SCIM
item.description: Understand the reasons for SCIM Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Links to original docs: All content on this page except the use case examples: Overview of lifecycle management in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-lifecycle-mgmt-overview/ Note that most of the content is not OIN specific Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: SCIM Overview
item.description: SCIM Overview Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - SCIM: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/scim/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic.Â For example, there are product \ feature overviews: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/multi-tenancy/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/scim/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/auth-servers/ And there are also overviews of lower-level material. For example: The Client Credentials Flow: Taking this material from the top to “Set Up Your App”.

item.title: Differences between v1 and v2
item.description: Differences between v1 and v2 Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Overview of a SCIM application Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Title change and proof read content Links to original docs: - SCIM Protocol: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/scim/ Why is this here?: - In the Oktane GroupIt user research “SCIM Application was placed under the most in two groups: - Manage Users - User Lifecycle Management

item.title: Build a SCIM v2 app
item.description: Build a SCIM v2 app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update this doc to be more of a clear “How-to” on how to create a v2 SCIM app with all the required endpoints Pull content from the existing guide that would make a how-to for developers. All reference-style content belongs in the reference section.

item.title: Build a SCIM v2 app with entitlements
item.description: Build a SCIM v2 app with entitlements Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update this doc to be more of a clear “How-to” Changes: There is a lot of code in this guide without much explanation. We need to add more explanation of what the code is doing. Pull content from the existing guide that would make a how-to for developers.

item.title: Prepare your SCIM app
item.description: Prepare SCIM app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: See existing content field for more details. Links to original docs: ‘- Create a new doc from these two docs below. Prepare your SCIM API service (Test your SCIM API section) https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/scim-provisioning-integration-prepare/main/ - Only add content that is not OIN specific and only the preparation section only Test your Okta SCIM integration: https://developer.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: FAQ Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Query the support team and show them this doc. Ask them are there any new common questions customers would want to know the answers too. Update the FAQ. Ask support regarding most common SCIM questions and update the doc accordingly. Links to original docs: - SCIM technical questions: https://developer.
